data.title: Second Female Nobel Literature Laureate in History Grazia Deledda Signed "L'incendio nell'oliveto" by [Nobel Prize], Grazia Deledda: Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - Grazia Deledda. "L'incendio nell'oliveto" (1918) Signed. Grazia Deledda was the second woman writer to win the Nobel, for her "idealistically inspired writings.with depth and sympathy deal with human problems in general." Drawing inspiration from her own Sardinian village, Deledda's short stories, novels, and poems depict the oral tradition, communal support, and struggles of young women developing their own identities in rural communities like her own. - Second Female Nobel Literature Laureate in History Grazia Deledda Signed "L'incendio nell'oliveto"
data.text:
About this Item

Grazia Deledda. "L'incendio nell'oliveto" (1918) Signed. Grazia Deledda was the second woman writer to win the Nobel, for her "idealistically inspired writings.with depth and sympathy deal with human problems in general." Drawing inspiration from her own Sardinian village, Deledda's short stories, novels, and poems depict the oral tradition, communal support, and struggles of young women developing their own identities in rural communities like her own. Seller Inventory # 16150

Contact seller
